comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: This is a cropped version of an Agence Meurisse photo on the Gallica site, with the caption En Belgique : combats de Haelen et Diest : équipements de cavalerie allemande pris par les Belges [In Belgium: Battle of Haelen and Diest: German cavalry equipment taken by the Belgians] gallica.bnf.fr/ark:/12148/btv1b9041343h Publication date 1914

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: artolog:  Thanks for pointing us to the original.  We'll include the date and full, translated title next time we update the description.
